overview: Akiko is a girl who has a modest and shy personality, but wants to be loved by everyone. At first she tries to become an idol, but she isn't popular and gets frustrated. Then Akiko, who has turned 30, looks for another outlet for approval and gets the courage to apply for a job as a virtual YouTuber. This is a youth movie set in the world of modern self-realization of "Vtubers". The heroine Akiko sways between her own potential and evaluating others, with a reciprocal relationship and desire for approval while supporting and being supported by others.
title: Virtual YouTuber
